description: I'm an enthusiastic software developer and Computer Science student. I began my journey in 2019 with robotics, and since then, my focus has been on tackling challenges, creating efficient and scalable solutions.
I'm dedicated consistenly to applying and enhancing my skills, as well as contributing to innovative initiatives.

educations.name: Computer Science
educations.institution: Federal University of São João del Rei

contests.title: F1 in Schols
contests.description: In F1 in Schools, my team SwordFish was challenged to project, test, build and race with a miniature Formula 1 car, working in Marketing and Project Management, also presenting all the work to the judges.

contests.title: OBR
contests.description: My first contact with programming, the Brazilian Robotics Olympiad was an incredible experience, For the first time I was able to work with a team to achieve a goal, learning as much as possible along that time with Death Punch and D4RKMODE.

contests.title: Hackathon AEB
contests.description: In the hackathon of the Brazilian Space Agency, the competitors had to program a entire code for a space rover in the moon, which must follow a track, avoid obstacles and deal with terrain unevenness, all that on the sBotics Simulator.

contests.title: ANICON
contests.description: ANICON is a traditional regional event which mixes geek culture, technology and the robotics contests. My team (StrangerBots404), made up by 3 great friends, won the fastest line follower category.

contact.email-me-at: You can email me directly at
contact.subject: Subject
